newsitem.title: USA: U.S. stock index futures finish lower, off lows.
newsitem.headline: U.S. stock index futures finish lower, off lows.

text.p: Aug 23 - U.S. stock index futures ended lower, but most were up from day's lows. Sept S&P 500 futures drifted up slightly once T-bond futures closed, but volume was very light. Traders said overall volume during Friday's sell-off less than on Thursday's rally. Mood seen non-committal heading into next week. Nikkei spread activity early, trading light overall. -Derivatives Desk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
